### Government Tender Announcement: AN/SSQ-36B BATHY Sonobuoys Procurement
#### [CB-7996-20482821]

**Public Notice Released on:** August 10, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 25, 2023 at 2:00 PM ET

**Document Title:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for AN/SSQ-36B BATHY Sonobuoys Procurement

---

**Contract Overview**

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to award a contract to Sonobuoy Tech Systems for the procurement of 600 AN/SSQ-36B BATHY sonobuoys. The contract will cover the supply and installation of LAU-126/A Sonobuoy Launch Containers for aircraft/shipboard training and operations.

**Technical Requirements**

The sonobuoys must meet the following specifications:

* Comply with the Production Sonobuoy Specification (PSS) dated October 1, 2008, with revisions effective March 17, 2016 (REV C CHG 1)
* Have a size A NATO A-size sonobuoy design
* Include a GPS-enabled feature for reporting GPS coordinates
* Be capable of deployment from a surface vessel and airdropped from a P-3 Orion or CP-140 Aurora aircraft
* Pass through a vertical right cylinder with a diameter of 4 15/16 (+1/64, -0) inches and a length of 4 feet with no additional force other than gravity

**Commercial Offer Requirements**

Suppliers must submit a Statement of Capabilities that demonstrates compliance with the technical requirements specified above.

**Notice Details**

**Prime Contact Information:**

* Person: Aaron Brown
* Email: aaron.brown@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 939-4559

** Tender Documents:**

The tender package is available on the Canadabuys website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7996/en-acan_w8485-247632---an-ssq-36b-bathy-sonbuoys-procurement.pdf

**About This Notice:**

This posting is an advance contract award notice, providing advance notice of the intended contract award. Suppliers must demonstrate compliance with the requirements outlined above to be considered for the contract award.
